item.maegytekhnika.energy_crystal.toolti: A crystal of energy, it provides energy but can't be recharged.
A shard of energy, it can be crafted into energy crystals or decrafted into energy fragments.
item.maegytekhnika.energy_crystal_shard_: A fragment of energy, it can be crafted into energy shards.
item.maegytekhnika.mana_crystal.tooltip: A crystal of mana, it provides mana but can't be recharged.
item.maegytekhnika.mana_crystal_shard.to: A shard of mana, it can be crafted into mana crystals or decrafted into mana fragments.
item.maegytekhnika.mana_crystal_shard_fr: A fragment of mana, it is use for crafting mana shards.
